snippet: A sweeping series of exhibitions and performances at Rutgers, Princeton and elsewhere will center on contemporary art by women with roots in the Middle East.
abstract: Fertile Crescent: Gender, Art and Society, a sweeping series of exhibitions and performances at Rutgers, Princeton and elsewhere, will center on contemporary art by women with roots in the Middle East (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: A sweeping series of exhibitions and performances at Rutgers, Princeton and elsewhere will center on contemporary art by women with roots in the Middle East.

headline.seo: From the Middle East, a Rarely Heard Chorus
headline.main: From the Middle East, a Rarely Heard Chorus
headline.print_headline: From the Middle East, a Rarely Heard Chorus
